mapper.select: SELECT a.ct_idx, a.ct_wish_start, a.ct_wish_end, a.ct_title, a.ct_age, a.ct_people_cnt, a.ct_end, b.mb_nickname, c.ca_img, c.ca_sido, c.ca_name FROM cp_crew_together a JOIN cp_member b ON a.mb_id = b.mb_id JOIN cp_camping c ON a.ca_idx = c.ca_idx WHERE 1 and b.mb_fire >= 1500 LIMIT 4

SELECT a.ct_idx, a.ct_wish_start, a.ct_wish_end, a.ct_title, a.ct_age, a.ct_people_cnt, a.ct_end, b.mb_nickname, c.ca_img, c.ca_sido, c.ca_name FROM cp_crew_together a JOIN cp_member b ON a.mb_id = b.mb_id JOIN cp_camping c ON a.ca_idx = c.ca_idx JOIN cp_member_age d ON b.ma_idx = d.ma_idx JOIN cp_camping_like e ON c.ca_idx = e.ca_idx WHERE 1 AND a.mb_id != e.mb_id AND b.mb_fire >= 1500 AND e.mb_id = #{mb_id} AND ( (a.ct_gender = '혼성' OR a.ct_gender = (SELECT mb_gender FROM cp_member WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id})) OR a.ct_age = (SELECT ma_age FROM cp_member_age WHERE ma_idx = (SELECT ma_idx FROM cp_member WHERE mb_id = #{mb_id})) ) LIMIT 4

SELECT a.ct_idx, a.ct_wish_start, a.ct_wish_end, a.ct_title, a.ct_age, a.ct_people_cnt, a.ct_end, a.mb_id, b.ca_img, b.ca_sido, b.ca_name, c.mb_nickname FROM cp_crew_together a JOIN cp_camping b ON a.ca_idx = b.ca_idx JOIN cp_member c ON a.mb_id = c.mb_id WHERE a.ct_end = 0

SELECT a.ct_idx, a.ct_title, a.ct_gender, a.ct_age, a.ct_people_cnt, a.ct_camping_type, a.ct_tool, a.ct_datetime, a.ct_pet, a.ct_wish_start, a.ct_wish_end, a.ct_content, a.mb_id, b.ca_name, c.mb_nickname, c.mb_gender, d.ma_age, (SELECT cg_idx FROM cp_chat_group WHERE ct_idx = a.ct_idx) AS cg_idx, (SELECT COUNT(ct_idx) FROM cp_camping_crew WHERE ct_idx = a.ct_idx AND cc_crew = '크루원') AS cnt FROM cp_crew_together a JOIN cp_camping b ON a.ca_idx = b.ca_idx JOIN cp_member c ON a.mb_id = c.mb_id JOIN cp_member_age d ON c.ma_idx = d.ma_idx WHERE a.ct_idx = #{ct_idx}
